Errors.defaultError: Sorry, we really do not know what could have gone wrong. If the problem persists, please send an issue to helpdesk.
Errors.badRequest: Sorry, something went wrong while processing your request.
Errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized. If you think this is a mistake, please contact a competent person or send an issue to helpdesk.
Errors.forbidden: You are not authorized. If you think this is a mistake, please contact a competent person or send an issue to helpdesk.
Errors.notFound: Request is invalid. Please check the provided URL.
Errors.internal: Internal error occurred. Please try again and if the problem persists, send an issue to helpdesk.
Errors.serviceUnavailable: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Errors.requestTimeout: Request timeout. Please try again later.
Errors.baseNetworkError: Network error - resource is not available or does not exist.
Errors.uulamp-level10-lamp-provider/no-code: The Identification code property (code) is not defined.
Errors.uulamp-level10-lamp-provider/code-format: The Identification code property (code) can contain only alphanumeric characters and underscore. It must have at least 3 characters but not more than 32 characters.
Errors.uu-gateway-main/invalidRequest: Request is invalid. Please check the provided URL.
Errors.uu-app-workspace/forbiddenAwidSysState: Application workspace is not in an active state and is probably under maintenance. Please try again later.
Errors.uu-app-workspace/forbiddenAsidSysState: Application instance is not in an active state and is probably under maintenance. Please try again later.
Errors.uu-dockit-main/document/load/documentDoe: The document does not exist. Please check the property Document URL.
Errors.uu-dockit-main/document/load/userHasNotR: You have no access rights to the document. The lamp and switch are hidden.

UuLamp.Level01.LampCore.help: <uu5string/>The <UU5.Bricks.Code>UuLamp.Level01.Lamp</UU5.Bricks.Code> component is part of the uuLamp course. You can learn more in the <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/f64b2a2561c240288e9d0912794a6272' content='uuLamp educational material' target='_blank'/>.

UuLamp.Level02.LampCore.help: <uu5string/>The <UU5.Bricks.Code>UuLamp.Level02.Lamp</UU5.Bricks.Code> component is part of the uuLamp course. You can learn more in the <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/f64b2a2561c240288e9d0912794a6272' content='uuLamp educational material' target='_blank'/>.
UuLamp.Level02.LampCore.hiddenInfo: <uu5string/><UU5.Bricks.P>You are not authenticated and we don't know who you are! That is why we hid the lamp in a box and now you cannot tell its state.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>It can be off, it can be on or it can be both - wink - who can tell.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>Maybe it's time for you to log in and see for yourself!</UU5.Bricks.P>

UuLamp.Level03.LampCore.help: <uu5string/>The <UU5.Bricks.Code>UuLamp.Level03.Lamp</UU5.Bricks.Code> component is part of the uuLamp course. You can learn more in the <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/f64b2a2561c240288e9d0912794a6272' content='uuLamp educational material' target='_blank'/>.
UuLamp.Level03.LampCore.hiddenInfo: <uu5string/><UU5.Bricks.P>You are not authenticated and we don't know who you are! That is why we hid the lamp in a box and now you cannot tell its state.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>It can be off, it can be on or it can be both - wink - who can tell.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>Maybe it's time for you to log in and see for yourself!</UU5.Bricks.P>

UuLamp.Level04.LampCore.notAuthenticated: <uu5string/><UU5.Bricks.P>Nejste přihlášen(a) a nevíme kdo jste! Proto je obsah schován v krabici a vy neznáte jeho stav.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>Asi je čas se přihlásit a zjistit ho!</UU5.Bricks.P>

UuLamp.Level06.LampCore.noRoom: The Lamp component is not placed in a room! That is why we hide the lamp in a box - because we don't know the state of light in the room. Maybe it's time to place Lamp into the component Room.
